imperfective_info: The verb indicates an ongoing or habitual action.
perfective_info: The verb indicates a one-time action with a result.
game_type_info_1: This game asks questions in Russian or Uzbek, and you will need to choose one of the given answers for the challenge.
card_game_dialog_1: You can choose the language and type of question you are asked.
finish_game: Game over! Choose a new section
game_type_info_2: In this game, you will be asked a question and you have to guess it. It will be a closed question, meaning there will be no options.
finish_game_2: The game is over! To see the words you missed, click the button below.
card_game_dialog_2: Choose the type of questions you will be asked.
cafe_and_restaurant: Situation in the cafe and restaurant
